articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Elon Musk agrees that we’ve exhausted AI training data - TechCrunch
articles.description: Elon Musk concurs with other AI experts that there's little real-world data left to train AI models on.
articles.content:
Elon Musk concurs with other AI experts that there’s little real-world data left to train AI models on.
“We’ve now exhausted basically the cumulative sum of human knowledge …. in AI training,” Musk … [+2071 chars]
